metadata.synopsis: A couple of thugs are being briefed by their very corrupt Lawyer on how to not end up behind bars. This is the elf thug's one liner
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-9; 54; 207)- talk to the male elf.

0.speaker: Arborio Rolfin
0.text: I ain't saying nothing to nobody until I've had my trial.
0.context: NodeContext: keeping tight-lipped on the command of his lawyer

1.speaker: Arborio Rolfin
1.text: You won't get a word out of me.
1.context: NodeContext: keeping tight-lipped on the command of his lawyer
